article_title: 'Selma' screenings in namesake city prompts old memories, concern

article_metadata.author: Steven Zeitchik Los Angeles Times

og.description: SELMA, Ala. — Vera Booker recalls Bloody Sunday as if it happened last week. A 29-year-old-nurse in 1965, Booker was relishing some rare time off that fraught March weekend. Then
